abstract: Hess said it was prepared to support two of the five nominees put forward by the activist hedge fund Elliott Management, but the proposal was promptly rejected by Elliott.
snippet: Hess said it was prepared to support two of the five nominees put forward by the activist hedge fund Elliott Management, but the proposal was promptly rejected by Elliott.
lead_paragraph: 8:22 p.m. | Updated The Hess Corporation on Monday offered a concession to an activist investor after the investor’s board nominees waived their rights to a contentious compensation plan.

headline.main: Hedge Fund Rejects Proposal by Hess to End Proxy Fight
headline.print_headline: Hedge Fund Rejects Proposal by Hess to End a Proxy Fight
